title: Verify Crane Operator Certification
description: Before a critical lift, the safety officer must verify that the crane operator's certification is valid and on file.

tasks.description: Retrieve the personnel file for the scheduled crane operator.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator's file is retrieved from the HR system.

tasks.description: Check the expiration date of their crane operator certification.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the certification is valid for another 6 months.
